name: Rosaline S1 (VN)
description:
A Visual Novel Series in development by EvoSky Entertainment telling the story of Rosaline Martinez and her story growing up through a series of life events that will shape her to become one of the world’s most deadly assassins. Readers will see her story and unravel a rollercoaster of emotions justifying how strong she really is.

Season 1:

Rosaline’s childhood was not easy to say the least. Witness the beginning of her story, the people she met, the promises made, and the incidents that would spark a never ending series of events for her future. Season 1 is planned to be 12 episodes long.

Join the EvoSky discord for updates, giveaways, feedback and support, and much more! https://discord.gg/MGXZnZTxyv

EvoSky Entertainment | Creating Indie Games and Visual Novels | Patreon

Changelog v0.04b (alpha to beta):

- Heavy grammar edits

- Adjusted transition times between certain scenes

- Added Animated/Static image toggle at start of game (can also be toggled via settings)

- Moderate code edits

- Reworked and organized folders and subfolders in game files

- Added android, macOS, and linux  version

Changelog v0.04c (beta to public release):

- Minor dialogue changes

- Credit changes

- Smaller android download size
